# port_organization_secret (Resource)

# Organization secret resource
  
Docs about organization secrets can be found [here](https://docs.getport.io/customize-pages-dashboards-and-plugins/organization-secrets).

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "port_organization_secret" "github_token" {
  secret_name = "GITHUB_TOKEN"
  secret_value = "ghp_1234567890"
  description = "GitHub token for authentication"
}
```

## Schema


### Required

- `secret_name` (String) The name of the organization secret
- `secret_value` (String, Sensitive) The value of the organization secret

### Optional

- `description` (String) The description of the organization secret

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
